title: 位1的个数 (Number of 1 Bits)
content: 思路:»> n&1=1 // @Title: 位1的个数 (Number of 1 Bits) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-03-10 21:15:28 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 38.6 MB // @comment: >>> n&1=1 // @flag: RED public class Solution { // you need to treat n as an unsigned value public int hammingWeight(int n) { int count=0; while(n!=0){ if((n&1)==1){ count++; } n=n>>>1; } return count; } }
